description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle WebCenter Sites component in Oracle Fusion Middleware 6.1, 6.2, 6.3.x, 7, 7.0.1, 7.0.2, 7.0.3, 7.5, 7.6.1, 7.6.2, and 11.1.1.6.0 allows remote authenticated users to affect confidentiality and integrity via unknown vectors related to Advanced UI, a different vulnerability than CVE-2012-3183 and CVE-2012-3185.
